description.compact: The Cud class
Code size
Code margin
QRcode ECC level
Get all setted properties, all properties are returned as string

return.description: string> All setted properties as string

description.compact: Format the float to string

Field: A (This field is mandatory)
Issuer TIN (NIF)
Fill in with the issuer's TIN (NIF) without Country prefix

Field: A (This field is mandatory)
Issuer TIN (NIF)
The issuer's TIN (NIF) without Country prefix

Field: B (This field is mandatory)
Buyer's TIN (NIF)
Fill in with the buyer's TIN. When issuing a document, the “Final Consumer” fill in with 999999990.

Field: B (This field is mandatory)
Buyer's TIN (NIF)
The buyer's TIN (NIF)

Field: C (This field is mandatory)
Buyer's Country
Fill in with the buyer's country code, as the Customers SAFT table.

Field: C (This field is mandatory)
Buyer's Country

Field: D (This field is mandatory)
Document type
Fill in according to the type of SAF-T (PT).

Field: D (This field is mandatory)
Document type
According to the type of SAF-T (PT).

Field: E (This field is mandatory)
Document status
Fill in according to the type of SAF-T (PT).

Field: E (This field is mandatory)
Document status
According to the type of SAF-T (PT).

Field: F (This field is mandatory)
Document date
Use the format 'YYYYMMDD'

Field: F (This field is mandatory)
Document date
Format 'YYYYMMDD'

Field: G (This field is mandatory)
Unique identification of the document
Fill in according to the type of SAF-T (PT).
Ex: 'FT A/999'

Field: G (This field is mandatory)
Unique identification of the document
According to the type of SAF-T (PT).
Ex: 'FT A/999'

Field: H (This field is mandatory)
ATCUD
Ex: 'CSDF7T5H-35'

Field: H (This field is mandatory)
ATCUD
Ex: 'CSDF7T5H-35'

Field: I1
Invoke only this method if the case of a document without an indication of the VAT rate, which should appear in table 4.2, 4.3 or 4.4 of the SAF-T (PT)

Field: I1
Verify if is a document without an indication of the VAT rate, which should appear in table 4.2, 4.3 or 4.4 of the SAF-T (PT)

Field: I2
VAT-exempt tax base of PT fiscal region
Total value of the tax base exempt from VAT (including taxable transactions under Stamp Duty, whether or not they are exempt from Stamp Duty).

param.description: Total value of the tax base exempt from VAT

Field: S
Other info
Field of free filling, in which, for example, information for payment can be indicated (ex: from IBAN or Ref MB, with the tab «;»).

docblock.description: This field cannot contain the asterisk character (*).
